Title: Volt Cafe Vending Platform
Description: Create a centralized app to order and vend items from multiple vending machines in a single transaction.

Title: View vending machine inventory
Description: As a user, I want to view available products from all vending machines, so I can select items to purchase.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Products grouped by machine
- Names, quantities, and prices clearly displayed
- Sold-out items marked visibly

Title: Develop backend API to serve inventory
Select products and add to shopping cart
Description: As a user, I want to select products from vending machines and add them to a unified cart for single payment.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Items appear in unified cart
- Cart allows adjustment/removal
- Supports multiple machines

Title: Test cart functionality across multiple machines
Checkout and pay for items
Description: As a user, I want to pay once for all items in my cart to complete my purchase.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Secure Stripe payment integration
- Payment success confirmation
- Clear error handling

Title: Send vend commands to vending machines
Description: As the system, I want to send vend commands after successful payment so products are dispensed correctly.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Commands sent after payment
- Commands match purchased products
- Errors clearly logged

Title: Create backend logic for sending vend commands
Develop simulator/mock vending machine API for testing
Real-time inventory updates
Description: As a user, I want real-time inventory updates after vending to view accurate availability.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Inventory updated immediately after vend
- Accurate without refresh

Title: Vending completion notification
Description: As a user, I want notifications when vending completes to know when to collect items.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Notification sent upon vend completion
- Clearly lists dispensed items
- Clearly notifies vend failures

Title: Backend event trigger for vending completion
Admin dashboard for inventory monitoring
Description: As an admin, I want real-time inventory and transaction monitoring.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Secure login
- Real-time inventory and transactions
- Web accessible
